name: Mobile Air Race
description:
Mobile Air Race is a 2.5D game based on the sport called air race.

Fly against time, try to win against 13 other pilots in a competition with 8 different tracks, to see who will be the best pilot and who will be at the top of the championship!

Team:

Arthur Martin: Game Designer/ Sound Designer/ Level Designer / Programmer

Márcio Kenji: Artist
